I LIKE this game. Okay. I LIKE DEAD BY DAYLIGHT. But THIS, is the THIRD TIME, that my game has updated itself with a update that supposedly came out in November. The THIRD TIME, I have to "Validate" my files. WTF ???? The Devs have locked down the section to comment on the latest patch. Besides that, they keep releasing more & more UNBEATABLE killers. People that can really ONLY be acquired by spending real world money. Which makes  this the world's most legit, "Free to Play" EVER ! Micro transactions out the wazoo. And with having to "Validate" my files over & over. What can I say. This game is just becoming more & more of a hassle just to load it up. Honestly, if you don't own it yet. Don't buy it. It's a dumpster fire currently. And based on the past, the Devs probably won't fix it anytime soon.

It's been a couple of months now. The game's still awesome. But AGAIN, the file validation thing is fixed, but now, it's that you have to keep "Installing" the game. This is the THIRD TIME IN TWO DAYS, that I've installed it. When you click the icons, it asks you to install it again. WTF ???

Today is one day later. NOW it says it needs to update. But on the same screen it says update completed. I can't press the "Play Game" button. WTF???

Now when I try to uninstall & reinstall it. It won't install because of some F:drive map error. The thing is though, I created a whole NEW steamlibrary section just for this game. And it STILL won't install.

Today is 6?18/2021
I have to install it for a fourth time now. I wrote the last section YESTERDAY.

Very fun game to play with friends! There are in game purchases but you can earn them through gameplay, it does take a while to get just one character. I really enjoy the gameplay being in third person for the survivor and first person. Many jump scares for the first few times and has a very thrilling experience with the heartbeat sound of the killer. You do have to do quite a bit of playing to get good perks but the developers seem to be very generous with the blood points, which you use to get perks. Overall a very fun game with or without friends! Easy to pick up yet hard to master, which is fun because you don't get bored! personally id give this game a 9 out of 10.

The concept of the game is great - if you play with friends. If you play solo, there are probably better shooters out there to try. 

I don't give a negative Review for the game itself - but for the way it's monetized. 

Dead by Daylight is a game for which you need to pay 20 Euros for the base version. then there are "Chapter DLCs" which will cost you ~150 Euros(!). But that's not all.. It also contains (of course) battle passes and seasons. So if you are like me a person who likes to collect stuff in their game, you would need to pay like 170 Euros (even on Sale it would be 70 at least) + grinding that battle pass out like crazy. Behaviour Digital Inc. really monetizes the heck out of this game, cash grab at it's finest. I will never support any game that keeps binding you playing it which principles like battle passes, especially if it's already a full price title (like 20 Bucks is kinda full price for such a kind of game) and that's the reason why I gave (like for most gaming with such monetization systems) a negative Review. Don't buy it so you don't support such hideuos business strategys like I did.. Don't make the same misstake I did if you think like me.

#DeadByBoycott

Se você está lendo análises do jogo para saber se compra o Dead By Daylight ou não... Não, não compre. O jogo atualmente, apesar de ser muito divertido, se encontra numa péssima situação, onde os devs focam apenas em fazer dinheiro com a venda de cosméticos e DLCs enquanto deixam o jogo lotado de bugs. E nem é o tipo engraçado de bugs, e sim aqueles que realmente destroem a sua experiência com o jogo, e pra ser sincero é mais fácil você jogar uma partida com pelo menos um bug do que uma partida sem problema nenhum.

O motivo da hashtag neste post é porque o pessoal da gringa está se juntando para não dar dinheiro a mais de forma alguma para a BHVR (desenvolvedora do jogo) pelos próximos 3 meses, inclusive durante o período que será lançado uma nova DLC, com um novo killer, novo survivor, novas skins. Este movimento ainda não parece ter chegado no Brasil, pelo menos no momento que estou fazendo esta Review, por isso, se você é um jogador como eu que adora este jogo e quer ver ele numa situação melhor, por favor faça parte desse movimento.
E se você é uma pessoa comum que ainda não jogou DBD e não faz ideia do que eu estou falando, pense assim: Você gostaria de jogar um jogo que a desenvolvedora levou mais de 8 meses pra ajeitar um simples problema com a altura da vista de um dos killers, fazendo ele parecer que estava rastejando? Ou então que até hoje não sabe como otimizar o jogo deles? Sério, meu PC não é tão ruim nem tão bom, mas ele consegue rodar Doom Eternal no ultra, mas DBD com os gráficos no mínimo ele não aguenta nem manter 30 FPS. E nem me faça mencionar a situação que os jogadores de console passam com a otimização do jogo!


Enfim, espero que esta review possa te fazer pensar em se juntar a este boicote, ou então se segurar e comprar o jogo em outro momento. Eu já tenho quase 1500 horas neste jogo, e mesmo com um jogo cheio de problemas, eu ainda volto a jogar ele quase que diariamente, assim como a maioria da comunidade que envolve ele faz. Nós queremos ver este jogo numa situação melhor, e que os devs ouçam a comunidade com mais frequência.

Obrigado por ler. #DeadByBoycott

[h1]"I think we did a pretty good...job so far" - [i]game director, 2017[/i][/h1]

2020: 
-buggy as all hell 
-no matchmaking of any sort , just be matched with WHOEVER
-STILL pretty unoptimized to sh*t on new hardware
-crippling server lag and I'm on a 1Gbps connection
-Killers that are simply OP to heck 
- Survivors just move in a very clunky manner, some cases not where i even want 'em to go. 

It all just comes together to produce a symphony of a [b]TERRIBLE[/b] time spent with this game and that was with FRIENDS too! Which is typically UNIVERSAL fun no matter how bad - but this was just it folks. Don't see myself coming back. Like ever.
POGGERS GIERKA! JD
